Yaiba-0.2.2: Implementation of Buchberger's algorithmsSource codeContentsIndex
Yaiba.Buchberger
Description
Generates a Groebner basis of a supplied ideal.
Synopsis
modgB :: Ord (Mon ord) => Set (PolySug ord) -> Ideal ord
accgB :: Ord (Mon ord) => Set (PolySug ord) -> Ideal ord
Documentation
modgB :: Ord (Mon ord) => Set (PolySug ord) -> Ideal ordSource
This implementation of gB does not insert the supplied generators first. Instead, generators are inserted by sugar degree.
accgB :: Ord (Mon ord) => Set (PolySug ord) -> Ideal ordSource
Strategy accurate implementation of gB
Produced by Haddock version 2.7.2
